t: Amazon - Virginia Tech Initiative for Efficient and Robust Machine Learning | Amazon - Virginia Tech Initiative | Virginia Tech
s: Virginia Tech and Amazon are partnering to advance research and innovation in artificial intelligence and machine learning. The initiative focuses on machine learning-focused research projects, doctoral student fellowships, community outreach, and an establishment of a shared advisory board.

t: Amazon in the Arlington community: supporting Virginia Tech’s creativity and innovation at HQ2
s: This Valentine’s Day, Amazon HQ2 is teaming up with local favorites like Calluna Flower Truck, The Museum of Contemporary Art Arlington (MoCA), Brightly Ever After, and a variety of Met Park restaurants for a festive celebration of love and community in Arlington, Virginia.

t: Amazon.com: Virginia Brand: books, biography, latest update
s: Virginia Brand is a political journalist living in the Washington, D.C. area. Fueled by a love of Jane Austen and magic, Virginia wrote her first book "An Unnatural Inheritance" as a way to combine her two great passions.
